Posts.Content: 1976Perrone wrote: Breast cancer runs in my family I went for my first mammogram in may (I also have implants for 7 years now) Ok so I had a mamo in May - all good Then a month ago my breast and armpit was itchy - no rash ... Then I got like heat waves through my R breast - so I go get a ultra sound and they found cyst but one was uncomfortable when she touched it - the woman that performed the ultra sound left the room saying I was ok but has a weird stare at the woman behind the counter and said I need to see surgeon today (that was Friday) they said I'd not today - come in Monday morning to talk to doctor and she will be aspirating that cyst - I don't like how they acted .... Could they have told me If I had something to worry or can only the doctor do that ? I'm freaked out and can't sleep ... Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Scared - appt in the morning . 1976Perrone skapaya

Posts.Content: Dec 3, 2012 01:45PM 1976Perrone wrote: Thank you . I'm really trying .. I've tried to stay positive ... I'm so scared . I ve wanted to cut of my breast all weekend myself - I literally dreamed of it . This is crazy .. I'd the Surgeon sees me tomorrow I hope she can shed some light on it all
